H0.text: In the Bible from whom did David steal his wife Bathsheba. Abner

H1.text: In the Bible from whom did David steal his wife Bathsheba. Joab

H2.text: In the Bible from whom did David steal his wife Bathsheba. Ahithophel

H3.text: In the Bible from whom did David steal his wife Bathsheba. Urya

A4.text: Bathsheba was Uriah the Hittite's wife.
